game.name: Make it! Kushikatsu
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Get ready for a delicious kushikatsu-making challenge! Make tons of kushikatsu and watch your food cart prosper!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get ready for a delicious kushikatsu-making challenge! Make tons of kushikatsu and watch your food cart prosper!
